title: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aggressive Characters   Appearance Changes   Artifact Crafting   Betrayal   Comedic Undertone   Crafting   Cunning Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Friendship   God Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic   Power Struggle   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Saints   Strong to Stronger
author: SAN.G   산지직송
description:
The dead cannot speak.

It means the living can create any story they want.

Inheritance, honor and wealth can be taken away by lies.

However, what happens when a person, who was presumed to be dead, returns alive?>
